data.title: Sivaji Ganesan filmography
data.text:
The filmography of Sivaji Ganesan (1928–2001) comprises a total of 288 movies with 275 Tamil, 9 Telugu, 2 Malayalam and 2 Hindi. He is the only actor to have played the lead role in over 250 films in Tamil cinema.[1] Apart from these, he has acted in 17 films as honorary appearance.
